name: Helicopter Games - Helicopter flight Simulator
description:
Select from vast range of choppers. Be the pilot, arm your chopper and seek and hit with accurate navigation in your desirable game mode.

13+ Mission included:

13 plus diversified missions included to keep the users intact by the curiosity of what is coming next in other levels.

Features include:

• Multiple helicopters with variety of war equipment
• Three different game mode (day, night and attacking)
• Heavy loads ammo missile and machine gun
• 3D navigation
• High resolution 3D graphics and stunning visuals
• Replay option to start the mission again
